briefTitle: Effect of Neoadjuvant or Adjuvant Systemic Therapy on Breast Cancers, Bone Marrow Cancer Cells, and Circulating Cancer Cells
officialTitle: Effect of Neoadjuvant or Adjuvant Systemic Therapy on Breast Cancers, Bone Marrow Cancer Cells, and Circulating Cancer Cells
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Characterize tumor markers expressed by DTC which are present after systemic therapy
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Recently diagnosed with clinical stage II, III, or IV breast cancer
* Planning to undergo neoadjuvant or adjuvant systemic therapy; patients who have already completed neoadjuvant systemic therapy are also eligible
* Must be \>= 18 years of age
* If female, must not be pregnant
* Must not have Hepatitis B, C, or HIV
* Must be willing and able to sign informed consent document
